document_data.name: Yuji Takaesu
document_data.mainbody: '''Yuji Takaesu''' was a [[samurai]] in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.Personality: Yuji was totally loyal to his [[daimyo]]. He loved music and outside his government dutieshe  was an introspective and intellectual individual.
document_data.Activities: Yuji was the right-hand man of the daimyo [[Benju Matsutomo]]. His hobbies were acting in [[noh]] plays with Benju and playing [[go]].
document_data.History: Yuji met Benju Matsutomo when he was a simple samurai general. From that day, Yuji was his closest advisor and best friend.
